content: अमाय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not cunning or sagacious, guileless, sincere, honest. {@--2@} Immeasurable. --या {@--1@} Absence of fraud or deceit, honesty, sincerity. {@--2@} (In Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>) Absence of delusion or error, knowledge of the supreme truth. --यं The Supreme Spirit (ब्रह्म).
